pullRequest.body:
If S is a localization of a commutative semiring R, then tensoring with S over R preserves injective linear maps. If R is a ring, then this is equivalent to flatness, which was already in Mathlib. Even though #19115 generalizes flatness to semirings, it's not clear whether the definition of flatness (preservation of injectivity of inclusion of ideals) implies preservation of all injective linear maps, so this PR adds `lTensor_preserves_injective_linearMap`.

---

- [ ] depends on: #19115
- [ ] depends on: #19118
